Translations.Text: Kandi n’iyo abatuye imidugudu baza kwemera bakanatinya (Allah), mu by’ukuri, twari kubafungurira imigisha iturutse mu kirere no mu isi, ariko barahakanye; nuko tubahanira ibyo bakoraga
Ese abatuye imidugudu bibwira ko batekanye, ko nta gihano cyacu cyabageraho nijoro baryamye
Cyangwa abatuye imidugudu bibwira ko batekanye, ko nta gihano cyacu cyabageraho ku gasusuruko bahugiye mu by’isi
Ese bibwira ko batekanye, badashobora kugerwaho n’ibihano bya Allah? Ntabibwira ko badashobora kugerwaho n’ibihano bya Allah uretse abanyagihombo

Ese babandi bazunguye ubutaka nyuma y’uko bene bwo (barimbuwe), ntibabona ko iyo tuza kubishaka twari kubahanira ibyaha byabo (nk’uko twabigenje ku bababanjirije), tukanadanangira imitima yabo maze ntibabashe kumva

Iyo yari imidugudu tukubarira inkuru zayo (yewe Muhamadi). Mu by’ukuri, intumwa zabo zabazaniye ibimenyetso bigaragara ariko ntibashobora kwemera ibyo bahakanye mbere. Uko ni ko Allah adanangira imitima y’abahakanyi
Kandi abenshi muri bo twasanze ari abantu batubahiriza amasezerano; ahubwo twasanze abenshi muri bo ari inkozi z’ibibi
Nuko nyuma (y’izo ntumwa) twohereza Musa kwa Farawo n’abantu be, tunamuha ibitangaza byacu (azifashisha), maze barabihakana. Ngaho irebere uko iherezo ry’abangizi ryagenze
Nuko Musa aravuga ati "Yewe Farawo! Mu by’ukuri, njye ndi intumwa yoherejwe na Nyagasani w’ibiremwa byose
